title: Don't start off with an accident
creator_credit: Reg Perier, Perier Films, New South Wales. Dept. of Labour and Industry and Stan Murdoch
brief_description: Starts with a young recruit to a production factory who has a minor accident with equipment. Shows the many dangers with improper equipment handling and the importance of safety training. Expands to cover safety aspects of other industries, particularly building.
creator_credit_for_label: Reg Perier, Perier Films, New South Wales. Dept. of Labour and Industry and Stan Murdoch
